name: Blood on One's Hands
text: Give to the James Howlett player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: • Discard Wolverine's Claws → remove Blood on one's Hands from the game. • Place 3 wound counters on Old and Tired. Discard this card.

name: Old Man Hulk
text: [star] Old Man Hulk gets +1 ATK for each damage token here. Forced Response: After a [[GAMMA]] minion is defeated, deal 1 damage to Old Man Hulk. (Old Man Logan's nemesis minion.)

name: Debt Collection
text: The Hulk Gang is going around collecting debt. If you can't pay up, prepare to take a beating. [crisis] When Revealed: The James Howlett player must choose to either take 2 damage or place 1 additional threat here.

flavor: "You don't have this month's rent. Which is why my brothers are here today. You met Otis and Charlie?
name: Bobbie-Jo Banner
text: When Revealed: If Charlie Banner is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for him. Reveal him and put him into play engaged with you.

flavor: "Are you ready to take your beating?"
name: Charlie Banner
text: When Revealed: If Otis Banner is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for him. Reveal him and put him into play engaged with you.

flavor: "This punk tryin' ta piss us off?"
name: Otis Banner
text: When Revealed: If Bobbie-Jo Banner is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for her. Reveal her and put her into play engaged with you.
